last_episode_to_air.name: Consider Me Gone
last_episode_to_air.overview: It's a sad day in the Tanner household as ALF announces he's leaving Earth to settle on another planet with Skip and Rhonda, but ALF is captured by the Alien Task Force before he can get to their spaceship.

name: ALF
overview: A furry alien wiseguy comes to live with a terran family after crashing into their garage.

episodes.name: A.L.F.
episodes.overview: Gordon Shumway, last known survivor from the planet Melmac, crash-lands his spaceship into the Tanner family's suburban garage. Willie dubs him "ALF", short for Alien Life Form. After convincing a military officer that they are not harboring a space creature, the Tanners decide to take ALF in as a member of the family.

guest_stars.character: Alien Task Force Officer Darnell Valentine
guest_stars.name: Francis X. McCarthy

episodes.name: Strangers in the Night
episodes.overview: ALF decides to have some fun while a nervous Mrs. Ochmonek baby-sits Brian.

episodes.name: Looking for Lucky
episodes.overview: When Lucky the cat disappears, everyone pins the blame on ALF.

episodes.name: Pennsylvania 6-5000
episodes.overview: ALF calls the president to address his concerns about nuclear weapons.

episodes.name: Keepin' the Faith
episodes.overview: ALF takes a job selling cosmetics over the phone.

episodes.name: For Your Eyes Only
episodes.overview: ALF befriends a lonely blind girl.

episodes.name: Help Me, Rhonda
episodes.overview: Willie helps homesick ALF arrange a trip to Melmac.

episodes.name: Don't It Make My Brown Eyes Blue?
episodes.overview: ALF has a crush on Lynn, so he makes a music video to impress her.

episodes.name: Jump
episodes.overview: On his 45th birthday, Willie feels unfulfilled, so ALF suggests he go skydiving.

episodes.name: Baby, You Can Drive My Car
episodes.overview: ALF sells parts of his spaceship to buy Lynn a Ferrari.

episodes.name: On the Road Again
episodes.overview: Willie loses his temper with ALF during a family camping trip.

episodes.name: Oh, Tannerbaum
episodes.overview: It's Christmastime. Unfortunately ALF chops the Christmas tree into firewood before anyone notices. The Tanners then have two tasks: to teach ALF all about Christmas and find a new Christmas tree.

episodes.name: Mother and Child Reunion
episodes.overview: ALF heads for the garage when Kate's mother pays a visit.

episodes.name: A Little Bit of Soap
episodes.overview: ALF submits scripts to his favorite soap opera.

episodes.name: I've Got a New Attitude
episodes.overview: ALF plays matchmaker for Kate's mother.

episodes.name: Try to Remember (1)
episodes.overview: ALF hits his head and is convinced he is an insurance salesman. The Tanners try reviewing past events to try and jog his memory.

guest_stars.character: Alien Task Force Officer Darnell Valentine (archive footage)
guest_stars.name: Francis X. McCarthy

episodes.name: Try to Remember (2)
episodes.overview: The Tanners continue to try and jog ALF's memory, and deal with the police at the same time.

guest_stars.character: Alien Task Force Officer Darnell Valentine (archive footage)
guest_stars.name: Francis X. McCarthy

episodes.name: Border Song
episodes.overview: ALF befriends a young Mexican immigrant.

episodes.name: Wild Thing
episodes.overview: ALF goes through a 24-hour period of bizarre behavior.

episodes.name: Going Out of My Head Over You
episodes.overview: Willie and ALF both talk to a psychologist.

episodes.name: Lookin' Through the Windows
episodes.overview: ALF thinks he witnessed a murder at a neighbor's house.

episodes.name: It Isn't Easy ... Bein' Green
episodes.overview: ALF comes to Brian's aid when the boy has to play an asparagus in the school play.

episodes.name: The Gambler
episodes.overview: ALF develops a gambling habit and winds up in trouble with his bookie.

episodes.name: Weird Science
episodes.overview: Brian causes trouble at school when he repeats some of ALF's intergalactic knowledge.

episodes.name: La Cuckaracha
episodes.overview: A cockroach from outer space invades the Tanner home.

episodes.name: Come Fly with Me
episodes.overview: When Mr. Ochmonek becomes sick during a flight, ALF flies the plane.

episodes.name: Working My Way Back to You
episodes.overview: ALF is relocated to the family garage as a result of his mischievous behavior.

episodes.name: The Ballad of Gilligan's Island
episodes.overview: ALF dreams he visits "Gilligan's Island", with castaways Gilligan, the Skipper, the Professor and Mary Ann.

episodes.name: Take a Look at Me Now
episodes.overview: Mrs. Ochmonek thinks she's gone crazy when she spots ALF in the backyard.

episodes.name: Wedding Bell Blues
episodes.overview: ALF joins a monastery after learning that his parents were married before he was born -- a disgrace on the planet Melmac.

episodes.name: Prime Time
episodes.overview: The Tanners become a TV-ratings family and ALF decides to rig the system so that his favorite program becomes a hit.

episodes.name: Some Enchanted Evening
episodes.overview: ALF becomes the star attraction at the Tanners' Halloween party.

episodes.name: Oh, Pretty Woman
episodes.overview: ALF helps Lynn boost her self-confidence by enrolling her in a beauty pageant.

episodes.name: Something's Wrong with Me
episodes.overview: ALF gets a severe case of hiccups after being excluded from Dorothy and Whizzer's wedding party.

episodes.name: Night Train
episodes.overview: Willie and ALF hop on board a freight train in search of adventure.

episodes.name: Isn't It Romantic?
episodes.overview: ALF and the Tanner kids give Willie and Kate a second honeymoon.

episodes.name: Hail to the Chief
episodes.overview: Kate dreams that she and ALF are rival presidential candidates.

episodes.name: ALF's Special Christmas
episodes.overview: ALF and the Tanners prepare to spend Christmas in a cabin. When the owner comes to visit them, ALF accidently jumps into his trunk and he is taken to a hospital and given away as a Christmas gift to a little girl.

episodes.name: The Boy Next Door
episodes.overview: ALF befriends the Ochmoneks' belligerent nephew, Jake.

episodes.name: Can I Get a Witness?
episodes.overview: ALF demands a fair trial after being accused of throwing a football through the Ochmoneks' window.

episodes.name: We're So Sorry, Uncle Albert
episodes.overview: ALF believes that he scared Willie's uncle to death.

episodes.name: Someone to Watch Over Me (1)
episodes.overview: ALF lends a hand with the neighborhood block patrol and ends up confronting a prowler in the Ochmoneks' house.

episodes.name: Someone to Watch Over Me (2)
episodes.overview: It's up to Willie to save ALF from the SWAT team surrounding the Ochomonek house, in which ALF had been chasing a prowler.

episodes.name: We Gotta Get Out of This Place
episodes.overview: ALF moves in with his blind friend, Jody, and learns some important lessons about life without sight.

episodes.name: You Ain't Nothin' But a Hound Dog
episodes.overview: ALF, jealous of the attention a stray dog is getting, gives the pooch to a mean old woman who claims to be the owner.

episodes.name: Hit Me with Your Best Shot
episodes.overview: Willie abandons his belief in pacifism after meeting the hostile father of the bully who's been pushing Brian around.

episodes.name: Movin' Out
episodes.overview: Willie has problems trying to sell the house because ALF keeps scaring off potential buyers with phony ghosts.

episodes.name: I'm Your Puppet
episodes.overview: ALF's mail-order ventriloquist's dummy takes on a life of its own, and it takes a visit from a psychiatrist to cure him.

episodes.name: Tequila
episodes.overview: Kate's friend, a known drinker, sees ALF in the kitchen and thinks she's hallucinating.

episodes.name: We Are Family
episodes.overview: ALF fantasizes that he reveals his existence to the world and serves as substitute host on David Letterman's show.

episodes.name: Varsity Drag
episodes.overview: ALF takes a job as a paper carrier when he learns that the cost of his upkeep is preventing Lynn from attending her first-choice college.

episodes.name: Stop in the Name of Love
episodes.overview: ALF hides out in the back seat during Lynn's date at the drive-in.

episodes.name: Stairway to Heaven
episodes.overview: In a fantasy sequence, ALF's guardian angel shows him what the Tanners' lives would be like without him.

episodes.name: Breaking Up is Hard to Do
episodes.overview: The Tanners let Trevor Ochmonek stay at their house after he has a fight with his wife.

episodes.name: Tonight, Tonight (1)
episodes.overview: ALF hosts "The Tonight Show", with Ed McMahon.

episodes.name: Tonight, Tonight (2)
episodes.overview: ALF hosts "The Tonight Show", with Ed McMahon.

episodes.name: Promises, Promises
episodes.overview: Betrayed confidences cause a falling-out between ALF and Lynn.

episodes.name: Turkey in the Straw (1)
episodes.overview: The Tanners are invited to a Thanksgiving dinner with the Ochmonek's bizarre relatives.

episodes.name: Turkey in the Straw (2)
episodes.overview: ALF must avoid the Alien Task Force when a bum blows the whistle on him.

episodes.name: Changes
episodes.overview: Kate goes back to work when a strike sends Willie home.

episodes.name: My Back Pages
episodes.overview: In a nightmare, Willie dreams ALF is his school roommate.

episodes.name: Alone Again, Naturally
episodes.overview: ALF mistakenly believes his cousin is living in Barstow, when he reads an article in the National Inquisitor.

episodes.name: Do You Believe in Magic?
episodes.overview: ALF makes Brian disappear with a mail-order magic kit.

episodes.name: Hide Away
episodes.overview: ALF is convinced gangsters are chasing the Tanners' houseguest.

episodes.name: Fight Back
episodes.overview: ALF's expose earns Willie a guest spot on David Horowitz's consumer advocate show.

episodes.name: Suspicious Minds
episodes.overview: ALF is convinced that a reclusive neighbor is actually Elvis Presley.

episodes.name: Baby Love
episodes.overview: ALF has an allergic reaction to a baby.

episodes.name: Running Scared
episodes.overview: An extortionist threatens to turn ALF in to the immigration authorities for being an ""illegal alien"".

episodes.name: Standing in the Shadows of Love
episodes.overview: ALF ghostwrites Jake's love letters.

episodes.name: Superstition
episodes.overview: ALF blames his streak of bad luck on a Melmac superstition.

episodes.name: Torn Between Two Lovers
episodes.overview: Lynn ends up with two dates for a dance through ALF's mishandled phone message.

episodes.name: Funeral for a Friend
episodes.overview: Desperate for a pet of his own, ALF acquires an ant farm.

episodes.name: Don't Be Afraid of the Dark
episodes.overview: ALF and Jake suggest Brian camp out to overcome his fear of the dark.

episodes.name: Have You Seen Your Mother, Baby, Standing in the Shadow?
episodes.overview: ALF sees Jake's kleptomaniac mother arrives for a visit, and steals a broach from Kate.

episodes.name: Like an Old Time Movie
episodes.overview: ALF imagines in black and white that he and the Tanners are silent-movie stars.

episodes.name: Shake, Rattle and Roll
episodes.overview: ALF prepares for the worst after experiencing a mild earthquake.

episodes.name: Having My Baby
episodes.overview: ALF prepares for the baby's arrival by re-enacting scenes from "The Dick Van Dyke Show."

episodes.name: Baby, Come Back
episodes.overview: ALF earns the right to baby-sit Eric, but almost blows it when the child disappears.

episodes.name: Lies
episodes.overview: Tabloid photographers accidentally photograph ALF, so the Tanners have to get the film back.

episodes.name: Wanted: Dead or Alive
episodes.overview: ALF shields Willie when a criminal resembling him is profiled on a crime-stopper TV show, but Trevor turns him in.

episodes.name: We're in the Money
episodes.overview: Using Willie's home computer, ALF discovers and later becomes addicted to the art of making stock-market deals.

episodes.name: Mind Games
episodes.overview: After a visit from a psychologist, ALF subjects the Tanners to a barrage of unwanted psychoanalysis.

episodes.name: Hooked on a Feeling
episodes.overview: Willie, in an effort to curb ALF's cotton addiction, holds a support group meeting in his living room.

episodes.name: He Ain't Heavy, He's Willie's Brother
episodes.overview: ALF, forced to hide, plots the removal of Willie's visiting brother Neal.

episodes.name: The First Time Ever I Saw Your Face
episodes.overview: ALF gets peeved about having to remain hidden while Willie's brother extends his visit.

episodes.name: Live and Let Die
episodes.overview: ALF's attitude toward cats changes after his first encounter with kittens.

episodes.name: Break Up to Make Up
episodes.overview: Whizzer comes face-to-face with ALF when he searches for Dorothy at the Tanners.

episodes.name: Happy Together
episodes.overview: ALF, on the outs with the Tanners, is offered a place to stay by Neal.

episodes.name: Fever
episodes.overview: The Tanners pamper ALF after he catches his first Earth cold.

episodes.name: It's My Party
episodes.overview: ALF is relegated once again to the attic when the Tanners throw a Hawaiian luau.

episodes.name: Make 'em Laugh
episodes.overview: ALF dreams he's a famous stand-up comic.

episodes.name: Love on the Rocks
episodes.overview: Neal and his ex-wife Margaret reconcile, but ALF goes a long way to prove her motives are less than honest.

episodes.name: True Colors
episodes.overview: ALF enters the art world after he earns praise for a still life made from food.

episodes.name: Gimme That Old Time Religion
episodes.overview: As a newly ordained Melmacian minister, ALF must officiate a ceremony on Earth.

episodes.name: Future's So Bright, I Gotta Wear Shades
episodes.overview: ALF considers the future with the Tanners, who will age faster than the ageless alien.

episodes.name: When I'm Sixty-Four
episodes.overview: ALF encounters youth-seeking senior citizens when he's discovered sneaking into a retirement home.

episodes.name: Mr. Sandman
episodes.overview: ALF and Willie scour Death Valley for buried treasure after discovering an old map.

episodes.name: Stayin' Alive
episodes.overview: A morally outraged ALF writes nasty letters to a pollution-producing company.

episodes.name: Hungry Like a Wolf
episodes.overview: ALF takes to the park in search of food after his diet fails.

episodes.name: I Gotta Be Me
episodes.overview: ALF is the only one excited by the idea of Lynn moving in with her boyfriend.

episodes.name: Consider Me Gone
episodes.overview: It's a sad day in the Tanner household as ALF announces he's leaving Earth to settle on another planet with Skip and Rhonda, but ALF is captured by the Alien Task Force before he can get to their spaceship.
